State Regulations
(a) The gradual
extinguishment of any amount over a period of time: as, the retirement of a
debt by serial payments to the creditor or into a sinking fund; the periodic
writedown of an insurance premium or a bond premium. (b) A reduction of the book value of a fixed
asset; a generic term for the depreciation, depletion, writedown or writeoff of
a limited-life asset. Notes
